token.title: Bond Token
token.description: Can be found in the bond app by tapping your Bond device and looking for 'Local Token'.

hide_device_ids.title: Hide Device IDs
hide_device_ids.description: Hide individual devices by Device ID. Device ID can be found in the Bond app under Device Settings.

include_dimmer.title: Include dimmer
include_dimmer.description: If dimming is a valid action on a device, it will be included as additional switch on the accessory. Since this is an odd solution to dimming, it's off by default.

include_cf_light.title: Include Ceiling Fan Light
include_cf_light.description: Unchecking this will hide ALL Ceiling Fan Light accessories and actions in HomeKit for all Ceiling Fans.

include_toggle_state.title: Include toggle switch for fixing device state.
include_toggle_state.description: This will add a switch to single-action accessories to toggle the state (i.e. Shades, Fireplace, Generic, Lights). Fan speeds are not eligible for this option.

fan_speed_values.title: Use fan speed values
fan_speed_values.description: Use fan speed values instead of percentages (i.e. Hey Siri set the Office Fan to 2).
